title: [Mincraft.net | INSIDER] 《Minecraft 地下城》开发日志：起源
author: :spgbigfan:
txt_content:
Minecraft Dungeons Diaries: Origins
《Minecraft 地下城》开发日志：起源
VIDEO: A chat with the devs of Minecraft Dungeons!
与《Minecraft 地下城》开发人员的相谈视频！
Have you ever wanted to learn more about the origins of the upcoming game Minecraft Dungeons, straight from the devs themselves? Same. Luckily, we have the skills and know-how to make that happen, and thus the Minecraft Dungeons Diaries: Origins video was born! Also luckily for you, we’ve captured elusive footage of David Nisshagen’s truly fantastic hair. If you want to learn more about the game and hear less of me angrily wishing my hair had that much magnificent volume, you’ll need to watch the video for yourself!
你是否曾想过直接从开发人员那里详细了解即将上市的《Minecraft 地下城》？我也是。好在，我们有能力，也有经验去与开发人员对接，因此就有了本期视频， 《Minecraft 地下城》开发日志：起源 ！此外，你的运气也不错，因为我们捕捉到了非常珍贵的影像——David Nisshagen的奇妙发型。如果你不想再听我唠叨为什么我的头发没他的繁多，而是想了解更多关于游戏的事情，那么你就得自己看视频了！


视频由@广药 提供，>>请点击此处观看视频<<

Want more great Minecraft videos?Subscribe to our YouTube channel!
还想看更多精彩的 Minecraft 相关视频？那就来订阅我们的频道吧！


【原文：Minecraft Dungeons Diaries: Origins】
【作者：Kelsey Howard，发布日期：2019-10-29，译者：Kakagou】
